name: Beyond the Thaw
description:
Unreal Spring Jam 2020 submission

Team Name: Dazvolt
Team Members email: dazvolt@gmail.com

Modifier categories:
ARMY OF ONE

List of used content:

Unreal marketplace:

  • Procedural Lanscape Ecosystem (for foliage)
    Chameleon (post-process effects)
    IceCool (frozen lake mat)
    M5VFX (for fires vfx)
    Landscapes pack
    InfinityBladeEffects (edited vfx from it)
    MegaGameMusicCollection (for music)
    PolyArtWolf
    PostApocalypticPack (meshes)
    SurvivalItemsPack (meshes)
    UltimateSFXBundle (footsteps)
    UltraDynamicSky
    ArchVizInterior (meshes & mats)

Other:

  • Quixel Megascans: decals (snow footprints, melted snow), surfaces (snow), rocks (icelandic cliff and boulder)
    Sound effects: snow blowing, fire cracking, wolf howls, bear growl - from soundsnap
    Few meshes - plane, cabin - from free 3d models resources

Link to gameplay footage:

Story:

You start as a survivor during plane crash in mountains. Snow everywhere, nature is harsh, and you must find the way through. Find out mystery story behind this game. "What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw".
